com.music.player.lib.view

类 MusicWindowPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • com.music.player.lib.view.MusicWindowPlayer

  • public class MusicWindowPlayer
extends FrameLayout
    Created by TinyHung@outlook.com 2019/6/11 Music Window Player 一个包含唱片机、垃圾桶的悬浮窗交互窗口View,适用于ViewGroup
